mapper.select: select distinct cs.co_studyId as 'co_studyId', cs.co_email as 'co_email', cs.co_title as 'co_title', cs.co_location as 'co_location', cs.co_content as 'co_content', cs.co_mainImg as 'co_mainImg', cs.co_process as 'co_process', DATEDIFF(cs.co_deadLine, now()) as 'co_deadLine', IF(chs.status is null, false, chs.status) as 'co_heart', (select count(*) from CoHeartOfStudy as chscnt where cs.co_studyId = chscnt.co_studyId) as 'co_heartCount', cls.co_languages as 'co_languages', cps.co_part as 'co_part', cps.co_total as 'co_total', chs.createdAt as 'createdAt', cs.status as 'status' from CoStudy as cs left join CoHeartOfStudy as chs on cs.co_studyId = chs.co_studyId and chs.co_email = #{co_email} left join CoPartOfStudy as cps on cs.co_studyId = cps.co_studyId left join (select co_studyId, GROUP_CONCAT(cl.co_logo SEPARATOR ',') as co_languages from CoLanguageOfStudy as clo join CoLanguage as cl on clo.co_languageId = cl.co_languageId group by co_studyId) as cls on cs.co_studyId = cls.co_studyId where chs.status = true order by chs.createdAt desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'Info' AS 'co_type', cib.co_infoId AS 'co_infoId', NULL AS 'co_qnaId', cib.co_email AS 'co_email', cib.co_mainImg AS 'co_mainImg', cu.co_nickname AS 'co_nickname', cu.profileImg AS 'profileImg', cib.co_title AS 'co_title', cib.content AS 'content', COUNT(cli.co_infoId) AS 'co_likeCount', cmoib.createdAt AS 'created_at',
( SELECT COUNT(ccoib.co_infoId) as cnt FROM CoCommentOfInfoBoard as ccoib WHERE ccoib.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId ) + ( SELECT COUNT(crcoib.co_coib) as cnt FROM CoReCommentOfInfoBoard as crcoib LEFT JOIN ( SELECT co_coib, co_infoId FROM CoCommentOfInfoBoard ) ccoib ON ccoib.co_coib = crcoib.co_coib WHERE ccoib.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId ) AS 'co_commentCount', if(cmoib.co_moib, 1, 0) as 'co_markCount', cib.createdAt, cib.updatedAt FROM CoMarkOfInfoBoard cmoib
JOIN CoInfoBoard as cib ON cib.co_infoId = cmoib.co_infoId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT co_infoId FROM CoCommentOfInfoBoard ) as ccoib ON ccoib.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId
LEFT JOIN CoLikeOfInfoBoard AS cli ON cli.co_infoId = cib.co_infoId LEFT JOIN CoUser cu ON cib.co_email = cu.co_email WHERE cmoib.co_email = #{co_email} GROUP BY cib.co_infoId, cib.co_title, cib.co_mainImg, cmoib.co_moib, cu.co_nickname, cib.content, cib.createdAt, cib.updatedAt UNION ALL SELECT 'Qna' AS 'co_type', NULL AS 'co_infoId', cqb.co_qnaId AS 'co_qnaId', cqb.co_email AS 'co_email', cqb.co_mainImg AS 'co_mainImg', cu.co_nickname as 'co_nickname', cu.profileImg AS 'profileImg', cqb.co_title AS 'co_title', cqb.content AS 'content', COUNT(clq.co_qnaId) AS 'co_likeCount', cmoqb.createdAt AS 'created_at',
( SELECT COUNT(ccoqb.co_qnaId) as cnt FROM CoCommentOfQnaBoard as ccoqb WHERE ccoqb.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId ) + ( SELECT COUNT(crcoqb.co_coqb) as cnt FROM CoReCommentOfQnaBoard as crcoqb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT co_coqb, co_qnaId FROM CoCommentOfQnaBoard ) ccoqb ON ccoqb.co_coqb = crcoqb.co_coqb WHERE ccoqb.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId ) AS 'co_commentCount', if(cmoqb.co_moqb, 1, 0) as 'co_markCount', cqb.createdAt, cqb.updatedAt FROM CoMarkOfQnaBoard cmoqb JOIN CoQnaBoard cqb ON cqb.co_qnaId = cmoqb.co_qnaId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT co_qnaId FROM CoCommentOfQnaBoard ) as ccoqb ON ccoqb.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId LEFT JOIN CoLikeOfQnaBoard AS clq ON clq.co_qnaId = cqb.co_qnaId LEFT JOIN CoUser cu ON cqb.co_email = cu.co_email WHERE cmoqb.co_email =#{co_email} GROUP BY cqb.co_QnaId, cqb.co_title, cqb.co_mainImg, cmoqb.co_moqb, cu.co_nickName, cqb.content, cqb.createdAt, cqb.updatedAt ) as subquery ORDER BY subquery.created_at DESC;
